title: Inflation rate in Saint Lucia 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
The chart in general has a zig-zag shape.

The line drastically remained stable by 4.1 times from Year 1984 to 1985,remained stable by 4.3 times from Year 1985 to 1986,remained stable by 3.2 times from Year 1986 to 1987,remained stable by 8.5 times from Year 1987 to 1988,remained stable by 5.3 times from Year 1988 to 1989,remained stable by 7.3 times from Year 1992 to 1993,remained stable by 3.4 times from Year 1993 to 1994,remained stable by 2.2 times from Year 1994 to 1995,remained stable by 6.3 times from Year 1995 to 1996,remained stable by 93.0 times from Year 1996 to 1997,increased by 320.0 times from Year 1997 to 1998,remained stable by 2.0 times from Year 1999 to 2000,remained stable by 20.3 times from Year 2001 to 2002,remained stable by 4.0 times from Year 2002 to 2003,remained stable by 2.7 times from Year 2004 to 2005,remained stable by 2.0 times from Year 2007 to 2008,remained stable by 34.7 times from Year 2008 to 2009,increased by 20.3 times from Year 2009 to 2010,remained stable by 2.4 times from Year 2013 to 2014,remained stable by 3.6 times from Year 2014 to 2015,remained stable by 3.1 times from Year 2015 to 2016,remained stable by 28.0 times from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, increased by 18.1 times from Year 2017 to 2018.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 7.04 was reported at Year 1987
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.01 was reached at Year 1997
